```{r notas, echo=FALSE}
nt <- read.csv('misc/notas201901.csv')
nt$MediaFinal <- ceiling(apply(nt[, 2:4], 1, function(x) {
    sum(x, na.rm = TRUE)/3
}))
knitr::kable(nt, row.names = FALSE)
```
